message_1: A rectangular field measures 100 meters by 80 meters. What are the dimensions of the largest square that can be placed inside the field?
message_2: The largest square that can be placed inside the rectangular field will have a side length equal to the shorter side of the rectangle. In this case, the shorter side is 80 meters. Therefore, the dimensions of the largest square that can be placed inside the field are 80 meters by 80 meters.
